channel.title: Morning Transportation
channel.description: Delivered every Monday by 10 a.m., Weekly Transportation examines the latest news in transportation and infrastructure politics and policy.

item.title: What’s next for the big rail merger?
item.description: The Surface Transportation Board has rejected Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern’s merger application. But it’s not necessarily the end of the line for the massive consolidation effort.
item.dc:creator: By Pavan Acharya, Chris Marquette and Sam Ogozalek
item.dc:contributor: By Pavan Acharya, Chris Marquette and Sam Ogozalek

item.title: Controller pay bill hits House turbulence
item.description: Bipartisan, high-profile legislation to pay air traffic controllers during future government shutdowns may need a GOP leadership lifeline.
item.dc:creator: By Pavan Acharya, Sam Ogozalek and Chris Marquette
item.dc:contributor: By Pavan Acharya, Sam Ogozalek and Chris Marquette

item.title: New year to-dos
item.description: Congress has less than a month to pass its transportation spending bill, among others, to stave off another potential shutdown.
item.dc:creator: By Pavan Acharya and Sam Ogozalek
item.dc:contributor: By Pavan Acharya and Sam Ogozalek

item.title: US transit faces a World Cup test
item.description: Next summer’s World Cup is drawing near — but will U.S. cities be ready to move the millions of soccer fans expected for the 39-day tournament?
item.dc:creator: By Pavan Acharya

item.title: Air traffic control overhaul update loading . . .
item.description: We’ll be getting an update on DOT’s massive air traffic control overhaul this week on Capitol Hill.
item.dc:creator: By Pavan Acharya and Sam Ogozalek
item.dc:contributor: By Pavan Acharya and Sam Ogozalek

item.title: The year-end nominee race is on
item.description: The Senate Commerce Committee will weigh several major transportation nominees, including a DOT official who would fill the department’s vacant top policy role.
item.dc:creator: By Sam Ogozalek and Pavan Acharya
item.dc:contributor: By Sam Ogozalek and Pavan Acharya

item.title: Congress’ advent calendar starts now
item.description: Congress will be back in town this week after the Thanksgiving break — and there’s a lot on the transportation policy to-do list before the next holiday hiatus at month’s end.
item.dc:creator: By Pavan Acharya

item.title: Turkey Day travel test
item.description: Some of the busiest travel days of the year are coming up this week. They’ll represent the first big test of the aviation system post-shutdown.
item.dc:creator: By Pavan Acharya and Sam Ogozalek
item.dc:contributor: By Pavan Acharya and Sam Ogozalek
